place.name: SHELTON
place.gazetteerText: SHELTON, a parish in the district of St. Neots and county of Bedford; 47½ miles W by N of Kimbolton r. station. Post town, Kimbolton, under St. Neots. Acres, 1,080. Real property, £897. Pop., 143. Houses, 27. The manor belongs to T. Harris, Esq. The living is a rectory in the diocese of Ely. Value, £200. Patron, Lord St. John. The church is ancient. (In 1870-72, John Marius Wilson's Imperial Gazetteer of England and Wales)
